attune-to-earth.name: Attune to Earth
attune-to-earth.description: Ground yourself in the ancient strength of stone and soil. Your Elemental Focus grows heavy with the weight of mountains, resonating with the bones of the world itself. While attuned, you can use Earth abilities. Attunement lasts until changed, depleted, or until rest.
attune-to-earth.notes: Visual: Focus appears dense and solid, with faint veins of mineral color

stone-strike.name: Stone Strike

special: Target's movement is reduced by 5 ft. until the end of their next turn

stone-strike.description: Hurl a jagged shard of condensed earth at your foe. The projectile strikes with the weight of bedrock, leaving wounds that ache like deep bruises.

earthen-barrier.name: Earthen Barrier

special: Create a 10 ft. wide, 5 ft. tall barrier
Barrier has 30 HP
Provides full cover to those behind it

earthen-barrier.description: Raise a wall of packed earth and stone between yourself and danger. The barrier crumbles after absorbing punishment but buys precious moments. Duration: 3 rounds or until destroyed.

tremor.name: Tremor

special: Does not affect flying creatures

tremor.description: Slam your focus into the ground and send shockwaves rippling outward. Targets must make a MIT + GRT check (Difficulty 30) or be knocked prone.

stone-skin.name: Stone Skin

special: Caster's movement is reduced by 10 ft.

stone-skin.description: Draw the resilience of stone into your flesh. Your skin takes on a gray, rocky texture. Caster gains +2 D20 on defensive rolls against physical attacks. Movement reduced by 10 ft. Duration: 4 rounds.

pillar-of-earth.name: Pillar of Earth

special: Target is launched 15 ft. into the air
Takes additional 1D10 fall damage unless they can fly
Can also create a 15 ft. tall platform (non-damaging)

pillar-of-earth.description: Command a column of stone to erupt from the ground beneath a target. The pillar launches them skyward before crumbling.

earthen-grasp.name: Earthen Grasp

special: Target takes 2D8 damage at start of each turn
MIT + GRT check (Difficulty 35) to break free

earthen-grasp.description: Cause hands of stone to erupt from the ground and seize your enemies. The grasping earth holds them fast, grinding against armor and flesh.

earthquake.name: Earthquake

special: Creates difficult terrain for 5 rounds
Structures take double damage

earthquake.description: Channel the fury of tectonic forces through your focus. The ground splits and buckles in a devastating upheaval.

entwined-attunement-earth.name: Entwined Attunement (Earth)

special: Attune to a second element without losing current attunement
Use abilities from both attuned elements

entwined-attunement-earth.description: Your mastery of elemental forces allows your Focus to hold two attunements simultaneously.

attune-to-water.name: Attune to Water
attune-to-water.description: Open your Elemental Focus to the flowing essence of rivers, seas, and rain. The focus becomes cool to the touch. While attuned, you can use Water abilities.
attune-to-water.notes: Visual: Focus appears wet and reflective, occasionally dripping

torrent-bolt.name: Torrent Bolt

special: Target is pushed back 5 ft.

torrent-bolt.description: Compress water into a high-pressure jet that punches through armor and flesh alike. The target is pushed back 5 ft.

soothing-waters.name: Soothing Waters
soothing-waters.description: Call upon water's restorative nature to mend wounds. Target heals 2D8 HP and removes one stack of Burned condition if present.

tidal-surge.name: Tidal Surge

special: All targets pushed back 10 ft.
Extinguishes non-magical fires

tidal-surge.description: Summon a crashing wave that sweeps across the battlefield, battering enemies and scattering formations.

aqueous-form.name: Aqueous Form

grants: Move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch
special: Cannot use abilities requiring solid contact

aqueous-form.description: Suffuse your body with elemental water, becoming fluid and difficult to pin down.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool

special: Enemies pulled 10 ft. toward center and take 3D8 damage
Enemies at center need MIT + SPD check (Difficulty 35) to move

whirlpool.description: Create a spinning vortex of water that drags enemies toward its center while battering them with relentless currents.

cleansing-tide.name: Cleansing Tide

special: Remove one condition from each affected ally

cleansing-tide.description: Release a wave of purifying water that washes over allies, mending wounds and purging corruption.

drown.name: Drown

special: 2D12 damage each turn, repeat save
Does not affect creatures that don't breathe

drown.description: Encase a target's head in a sphere of water, cutting off their air and filling their lungs with crushing pressure.

entwined-attunement-water.name: Entwined Attunement (Water)

special: Attune to a second element without losing current attunement

entwined-attunement-water.description: Your mastery of elemental forces allows your Focus to hold two attunements simultaneously.

attune-to-fire.name: Attune to Fire
attune-to-fire.description: Ignite your Elemental Focus with the primal hunger of flame. The focus grows warm, then hot, flickering with inner light. While attuned, you can use Fire abilities.
attune-to-fire.notes: Visual: Focus glows with ember-like light and radiates warmth

flame-bolt.name: Flame Bolt

special: If target is already Burned, deal additional 1D6 damage

flame-bolt.description: Hurl a condensed ball of fire that explodes on impact, searing flesh and igniting the unwary.

kindle.name: Kindle

special: If already Burned, add 1 stack (max 3)
Can ignite objects or create campfire-sized fire

kindle.description: Touch a target and set their very essence alight. The flames spread across their body, hungry and persistent.

fireball.name: Fireball

special: Flammable objects ignite

fireball.description: Compress flame into a roiling sphere and launch it at your enemies. The fireball detonates on impact.

flame-cloak.name: Flame Cloak

special: Melee attackers take 1D10 fire damage
Caster's melee attacks deal +1D6 fire damage

flame-cloak.description: Wreathe yourself in a mantle of protective fire. Enemies who strike you are burned in turn.

inferno.name: Inferno

special: Targets already Burned take +2D6 damage
Creates fire zone for 2 rounds (2D8 damage)

inferno.description: Unleash a torrent of flame that sweeps across a wide area, leaving nothing but ash and screaming.

cauterize.name: Cauterize

special: If Bleeding removed, target takes 1D10 fire damage (cannot be reduced)
Target cannot gain Bleeding for 3 rounds

cauterize.description: Apply searing flame to wounds, burning away infection and sealing flesh in a painful but effective treatment.

firestorm.name: Firestorm

special: Fire zone persists 4 rounds (3D8 damage)
Caster takes 2D8 fire damage from ambient heat

firestorm.description: Call down a rain of fire from above, transforming the battlefield into a hellscape of flame and destruction.

entwined-attunement-fire.name: Entwined Attunement (Fire)

special: Attune to a second element without losing current attunement

entwined-attunement-fire.description: Your mastery of elemental forces allows your Focus to hold two attunements simultaneously.

attune-to-air.name: Attune to Air
attune-to-air.description: Align your Elemental Focus with the breath of the world. The focus grows light in your hand, humming with distant winds. While attuned, you can use Air abilities.
attune-to-air.notes: Visual: Focus seems to float slightly and is surrounded by a gentle breeze

wind-slash.name: Wind Slash

special: Ignores 1 D20 of defensive bonuses from armor (air finds the gaps)

wind-slash.description: Compress air into a razor-thin blade and launch it at your target. The invisible edge cuts deep.

gust.name: Gust

special: All creatures pushed back 15 ft.
MIT + GRT check (Difficulty 25) to halve distance
Loose objects blown away
Can clear gas, fog, or airborne particles

gust.description: Summon a powerful blast of wind that shoves enemies away from you.

lightning-strike.name: Lightning Strike

special: If target is wet or in water, automatically gain Shocked (no save)

lightning-strike.description: Call down a bolt of lightning that arcs from the sky. The thunderclap leaves ears ringing and muscles twitching.

wind-walk.name: Wind Walk

grants: Does not provoke attacks of opportunity when moving

wind-walk.description: Infuse yourself with the swiftness of the wind. Your movements become a blur, and you seem to dance just ahead of danger.

cyclone.name: Cyclone

special: Creatures lifted 10 ft. into the air
Lifted creatures fall at end of turn (1D10 fall damage)
Flying creatures grounded while in cyclone

cyclone.description: Conjure a spinning vortex of wind that lifts and hurls enemies while battering them with debris.

chain-lightning.name: Chain Lightning

special: Arcs to up to 3 additional targets within 20 ft. for 2D10 damage each

chain-lightning.description: Release a bolt of lightning that leaps from target to target, seeking out enemies with crackling hunger.

storm-call.name: Storm Call

special: Each round, 2 random creatures struck for 2D12 lightning
Zone counts as difficult terrain
Flying creatures must pass SPD check (Difficulty 40) to stay airborne

storm-call.description: Summon a localized tempest of wind, rain, and lightning. The storm rages with primal fury.

entwined-attunement-air.name: Entwined Attunement (Air)

special: Attune to a second element without losing current attunement

entwined-attunement-air.description: Your mastery of elemental forces allows your Focus to hold two attunements simultaneously.
